messages.content: TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The following statements were posted to the verified Twitter accounts of U.S. President Donald Trump, @realDonaldTrump and @POTUS. The statements have not been edited or confirmed by Reuters.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Alabama Secretary of State John Merrill said he will certify Democratic Senator-elect Doug Jones as winner on Thursday. Moore had faced allegations of groping teenage girls when he was in his 30s.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Vanity Fair is bending over backwards in apologizing for the minor hit they took at Crooked H. Anna Wintour, who was all set to be Amb to Court of St Jamess, is beside herself in grief & begging for forgiveness!
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Finance ministry will evaluate whether to make fiscal changes in response to U.S. tax reform. In the document, the ministry said Mexico would not make changes that left it with a higher public sector deficit.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Bannon is a former top White House strategist and a former chief campaign aide to Donald Trump. Corey Lewandowski, Trumps former campaign manager, was also asked to testify. The panel is probing alleged Russian meddling into the 2016 U.S. election.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The Senate put off a vote until at least January, according to some lawmakers and aides. Democrats complained Puerto Rico was not getting enough help. Some fiscal hawks fretted about the overall cost.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
By a vote of 251-169, the House passed the measure to help Puerto Rico, the U.S. Virgin Islands and states rebuild. The bill now goes to the Senate where it is expected to be approved this week.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The U.S. House of Representatives takes a step toward averting a partial government shutdown. House approves rules to debate a bill that would fund federal agencies through Jan. 19. Also cleared for debate was an $81 billion disaster aid bill. House votes on both bills were expected later on Thursday.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President Donald Trump called on the Republican Congress to pass a short-term government spending bill. Current funding expires at midnight on Friday. Republicans in the House of Representatives have unveiled a stopgap bill.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

White House expects Congress to soon waive a rule known as Paygo. The rule requires the Senate to find offsets for the large tax cuts in the bill. Congress will likely waive the rule through the spending resolution.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President Donald Trump said he believed the financial markets have not fully absorbed the tax cut changes. Theyre thinking that the market hasnt fully digested what theyve got here, he said, referring to his economic advisers.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Short-term fix to fund Childrens Health Insurance Program into January. Congress expected to approve stop-gap funding bill this week. Short also said measure to protect immigrant youths known as Dreamers would probably not be considered until January.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The U.S. Senate parliamentarian has ruled against three provision of the Republican tax bill. The House of Representatives will have to hold a second vote on the legislation.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

House Majority Leader Kevin McCarthy advised House lawmakers that Senate Democrats were likely to object that the legislation fails to comply with the so-called Byrd rule. McCarthy said an additional procedural vote on the Motion to Concur is expected tomorrow morning.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The Senate voted 51-48 to debate the legislation about an hour after the House of Representatives. The debate period is due to last 10 hours officially but could be shortened to as little as five hours by parliamentary procedure.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Steny Hoyer, the No. 2 Democrat in the U.S. House of Representatives, said House Democratic leaders are asking rank-and-file members to vote against a stopgap government funding bill. A House Republican aide said earlier on Tuesday that the spending bill would fund the government until Jan. 19.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. Vice President Mike Pence will preside over the Senates vote on sweeping tax legislation. Republicans may need Pences vote in favor of the legislation to break a tie.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The U.S. Senate will vote on final tax legislation on Tuesday evening. The House of Representatives is scheduled to vote on the same legislation at 1:30 p.m. EST. If both chambers of Congress pass the bill, Trump will be able to meet his goal of signing it into law before Christmas.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The legislation includes $27.6 billion for the Federal Emergency Management Agency. President Donald Trump had requested $44 billion last month.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Republican U.S. Senator Susan Collins said on Monday she would vote for the sweeping tax overhaul. The first major overhaul of our tax code since 1986, she said in remarks on the Senate floor.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Republican Senator Mike Lee of Utah says he will support legislation. Only two Republicans remain undecided as the bill approaches a final Senate vote this week. Republicans control the 100-seat Senate by only a 52-48 margin.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The derailment of a train, which sent train cars crashing onto a major highway and killed passengers, in Washington state showed the necessity of an infrastructure plan. The train accident that just occurred in DuPont, WA shows more than ever why our soon to be submitted infrastructure plan must be approved quickly, Trump said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The vote could come around 1:30 p.m. EST (1830 GMT) Both the House and Senate must approve the measure before Trump can sign it into law. The Senate is expected to vote on the bill as early as Tuesday.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Short says he expects Congress to pass a short-term spending bill to fund the federal government. Current funding expires on Friday.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The Senate is expected to vote as early as Tuesday on tax legislation. McCain, undergoing treatment for brain cancer, will be out of Washington until January.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Democratic lawmakers have expressed concern that Trump might fire Mueller. Mueller is investigating allegations of Russian interference in the 2016 U.S. presidential election. Russia denies meddling in the election and Trump has denied any collusion.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Republican Senator Bob Corker said on Friday he will support the sweeping tax overhaul. The details of the legislation are expected to be released later on Friday, with votes expected in the Senate and House of Representatives next Tuesday.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Republican Senator Marco Rubio signaled his support for a sweeping tax bill on Friday. Rubio said changes to increase the refundability of a child tax credit marked a solid step toward broader reforms.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The refundable portion of an expanded child tax credit in the tax bill under negotiation has risen to $1,400. The move is an apparent bid to win support from Republican Senator Marco Rubio.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
House Ways and Means Committee Chairman Kevin Brady says text of bill will be posted when House comes into session at 5:30 p.m. (2230 GMT)
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Marco Rubio will support a compromise tax bill when it comes up for a vote next week, CNBC reported. The Florida lawmaker earlier on Friday repeated his concerns that an expansion of child tax credits in the bill was too little to win his support.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

House Speaker Paul Ryan told President Donald Trump a report on Thursday that Ryan was considering retiring was not true, the White House said. Politico reported that Ryan would like to retire after the November congressional election.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The White House says it will continue to work with Republican Senator Marco Rubio. The White House said it was proud lawmakers were already considering doubling the child tax credit.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Republican Senator Mike Lee has not decided whether to support a Republican tax bill. Lee wants changes to the child tax credit, an aide to the lawmaker said. The sweeping tax bill needs a simple majority to pass in the Senate.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

House Ways and Means Committee chairman Kevin Brady says property and income or sales taxes can be deducted under the state and local income tax deduction. "Yes," Brady said when asked if it was true.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
McCain is receiving treatment for brain cancer and has missed votes this week. He will be available next week to vote on the tax compromise bill, John Cornyn says.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
White House budget director Mick Mulvaney says he's "cautiously optimistic" on tax overhaul. Senate and House of Representatives could vote as early as Tuesday and Wednesday, respectively.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The bill unveiled by Republican Representative Rodney Frelinghuysen would fully fund national defense programs. Congress must pass a funding bill by Dec. 23 to prevent a partial government shutdown.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Republican U.S. Senator Bob Corker said he was still undecided on whether to support his partys tax legislation. Corker, whose party has a slim majority in the Senate and can only afford to lose two votes, told reporters: My deficit concerns have not been alleviated.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The White House has previously said it preferred a 20 percent tax rate for corporations. If it got down to 21 ... I would be thrilled, he said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. Senate Finance Committee Chairman Orrin Hatch says a deal has been reached on tax reform. Hatch said it was more than just an agreement in principle.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Republican leaders in the U.S. Senate and House of Representatives have reached an agreement in principle on tax reform legislation. The AP gave no further details and Reuters was not immediately able to confirm the report.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Omarosa Manigault Newman, a former reality television star, has resigned from the White House. She worked as the director of African-American outreach on Trumps 2016 presidential campaign.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Top Democrat in the U.S. Senate says bipartisan negotiations to protect undocumented people who immigrated to the United States as children are making very good progress. Senate Democratic leader Chuck Schumer says he hopes a bill could clear Congress by year-end.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Trump congratulates Democrat Doug Jones for winning U.S. Senate race in Alabama. Jones beat Republican Roy Moore, a former Alabama Supreme Court chief justice. Moore was dogged by allegations of sexual misconduct against teenagers.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Doug Jones, 63, a former federal prosecutor, prevailed over Roy Moore, whose campaign was dogged by allegations of sexual misconduct toward teenagers. Jones victory will reduce their majority in the U.S. Senate to 51-49.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
President Donald Trump will host congressional negotiators for lunch. Lunch will take place ahead of a speech on tax cuts Trump is to deliver.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Senate Democratic Leader Chuck Schumer said on Tuesday that President Donald Trumps tweeted attack on Senator Kirsten Gillibrand was nasty. More than a dozen women have accused Trump of unwanted sexual advances, which he has denied.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. House Speaker Paul Ryan defends a one-page analysis by the Treasury Department. The analysis asserted a tax plan pushed by the Republican-led Congress would pay for itself in 10 years. Chuck Schumer, the Senate Democratic leader, called the estimate fake math.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

There isnt any chance we are going to shut the government down, Mitch McConnell says. U.S. Senate Democratic leader Chuck Schumer says a full-year defense funding bill with short-term money for other programs would fail.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President Donald Trump will announce a new security strategy on Monday. White House national security adviser H.R. McMaster says it will focus on protecting the homeland. McMaster condemned what he said was Russian involvement in a new generation of warfare.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

President Donald Trump signed the annual defense policy bill on Tuesday. He urged Congress to fully fund the measure and lift the budget caps. The NDAA sets policy for the military but does not provide funding.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

A federal judge denied a request by President Donald Trumps administration to enforce his ban on transgender troops while the government appeals an order blocking it. The Department of Justice is currently reviewing the legal options.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. President Donald Trump will deliver a speech on the plan to overhaul the nations tax code on Wednesday. White House: "The president plans to speak Wednesday to the American people"
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Special Counsel Robert Mueller unveiled a trove of documents on Friday. Prosecutors provided emails, copies of documents tracking edits of the draft. That article was published on Thursday in an English-language Ukrainian newspaper.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Michigan Governor Rick Snyder said on Friday the state would hold a special election on Nov. 6, 2018, to replace Representative John Conyers. Conyers resigned this week amid accusations of sexual misconduct.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
By a vote of 235-193, the House of Representatives passed the bill. The Senate then approved it 81-14, sending it to President Trump for signing into law.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. House of Representatives passes bill to fund federal programs through Dec. 22. By a vote of 235-193, the House approved the stop-gap spending bill. The Senate is expected to pass the bill by Friday.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Manafort did not violate a court gag order when he helped edit an opinion piece, his lawyer says. The filing comes after prosecutors working for Special Counsel Robert Mueller said they could no longer agree to more lenient bail terms.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Libya has appealed to the United States to drop or ease a travel ban imposed on its citizens. Libya is one of six Muslim-majority countries subject to the travel ban. This week the U.S. Supreme Court allowed the ban to take full effect.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The White House says Donald Trump Jr. was on solid legal ground when he refused to answer questions. Spokeswoman Sarah Sanders said there was a legitimate reason and basis for not answering those questions.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Susan Bodine will serve as assistant administrator for EPAs Office of Enforcement and Compliance Assurance. In September, two senators threatened to hold up her confirmation out of concern that she was serving as special counsel to Administrator Scott Pruitt.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
By a vote of 238-188, the House approved the rules for debating the stop-gap funding bill. Legislation would extend funding for the U.S. government through Dec. 22.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The White House is focusing on getting the lowest corporate rate possible in tax reform legislation. Fifteen (percent) is better than 20, 20 isBetter than 22, White House spokeswoman Sarah Sanders says.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

House of Representatives Speaker Paul Ryan said he felt good about the vote count on a government spending bill. The bill is aimed at keeping the government from shutting down this week. Ryan also said Republicans want to talk to Trump and other congressional leaders about budget caps.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Democratic Senator Al Franken will announce his resignation on Thursday. A majority of his Democratic Senate colleagues called for him to step down following a string of sexual misconduct allegations.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The Department of the Interior is trying to be a better business partner to oil companies. The department plans to expedite permitting on drilling in Arctic National Wildlife Refuge in Alaska.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Democratic Senator Al Franken is facing intense pressure to step down following allegations of sexual misconduct. Franken spokesman Michael Dale-Stein said Franken would make a statement on the Senate floor but did not elaborate.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President Donald Trump would sign a stop-gap spending measure funding the government through Dec. 22. Trump and Congress are facing a deadline of Friday at midnight to pass fresh spending legislation. Parts of the federal government could shut down.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Democratic Senator Al Franken, facing allegations of sexual misconduct, will resign on Thursday, Minnesota Public Radio reported. Franken said on Twitter earlier on Wednesday he would make an announcement on Thursday.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. President Donald Trump hopes to find a way to avert a government shutdown. He will meet with Republican and Democratic lawmakers on Thursday, the White House said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The U.S. Senate voted on Wednesday to go to a conference committee to resolve differences between its tax legislation and a rival version passed by the House. Republican leaders are aiming to finalize tax legislation to pass it and send it to President Donald Trump by the end of the year.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The corporate alternative minimum tax is designed to limit the ability of corporations to reduce payments through tax breaks and credits. Republicans in the House of Representatives want to get rid of the AMT.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Justice Department seeking a warrant to seize an ancient ring believed to be trafficked by ISIS. The department also said it was amending a year-old forfeiture complaint to add three more antiquities. The ancient ring being sought by the U.S. government is thought to be in the hands of Turkish law enforcement.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Senator Dick Durbin, the No. 2 Democrat in the Senate, said Al Franken should resign in light of sexual misconduct allegations against him. He marked the 15th Democratic senator to call on Wednesday for Franken to step down.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Congress may be able to wrap up tax negotiations before Dec. 22, Senator John Cornyn says. The Senate will vote on Wednesday whether go to conference with the House of Representatives on tax legislation.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Senator Al Franken will make an announcement on Thursday, his office said. Several Democratic senators called for him to step down in light of allegations of sexual misconduct against him.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell said the Senate will vote later on Wednesday on whether to send its tax legislation to a conference. McConnell also said Congress later this week would pass a short-term continuing resolution measure to continue funding the federal government.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

House Republicans want tax legislation to eliminate the corporate and individual alternative minimum taxes. U.S. Representative Kevin Brady spoke after meeting with Republican lawmakers to discuss upcoming negotiations.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The top Democrats in Congress, Senator Charles Schumer and Representative Nancy Pelosi, would meet with Trump this week.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Deutsche Bank has not received any subpoena for financial records relating to the president or his family. No subpoena has been issued or received.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President Donald Trump says he expects the conference committee hammering out tax legislation in Congress will work well and get the job done fast. I think somethings going to be coming out of conference pretty quickly, Trump said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

House Ways and Means Committee Chairman Kevin Brady says he would push to make tax rate cuts for individuals more permanent. Brady also said he was concerned about the Senate tax bills restoration of the corporate alternative minimum tax.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. Secretary of State Rex Tillerson says the United States remains committed to Europe. He offers a public statement of support for European allies worried about foreign policy.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President Donald Trump is considering recognizing Jerusalem as the capital of Israel. Federica Mogherini said any action that would undermine peace efforts to create two separate states for the Israelis and Palestinians must absolutely be avoided.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President Donald Trump intends to nominate Michael Griffin. Griffin most recently served as chairman and chief executive officer of the Schafer Corporation. He held the top NASA job from 2005 to 2009.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

President Donald Trump says he supports Utah Senator Orrin Hatch running for re-election. Trump sidestepped questions of whether he was trying to block Romney from running. Romney and Hatch are Mormons.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Democratic leaders in Congress said on Monday they had accepted an invitation from President Donald Trump. House Democratic leader Nancy Pelosi and Senate Democratic leader Chuck Schumer said they hoped the president would remain open-minded about reaching a deal.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
President Donald Trump spoke to U.S. Senate candidate Roy Moore of Alabama. The president endorsed Moore's campaign, the White House said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. Senate Republican leader Mitch McConnell says he is optimistic the Senate and House of Representatives will reach a conference agreement. McConnell: Im very optimistic about it.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Kevin McCarthy, the No. 2 Republican in the House of Representatives, said the tax should be eliminated. The alternative minimum tax on corporations had been included in the U.S. Senates tax bill.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The U.S. Embassy to Russia said on Monday it would restart some visa services. It had previously canceled due to diplomatic expulsions that had left it short-staffed. The United States began to scale back its visa services in Russia in August.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President Donald Trump said in a tweet on Sunday he never asked former FBI director James Comey to stop investigating Michael Flynn. Flynn is the first member of Trumps administration to plead guilty to a crime uncovered by special counsel Robert Muellers investigation. Trump fired Comey from his post in May.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President Donald Trumps personal lawyer took responsibility for a tweet about the firing of former national security adviser Michael Flynn. In an interview with Axios, John Dowd said the tweet was my mistake.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Mick Mulvaney: White House willing to consider a small increase on the corporate tax rate. President Donald Trump suggested on Saturday that the tax rate could end up at 22 percent. Senate and House of Representatives reconcile or conference their respective versions of the legislation.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Secretary of State Rex Tillerson on Saturday denied that he was leaving his post to be replaced by CIA Director Mike Pompeo. Asked if there was any truth to the multiple reports about him this week, Tillerson said: None.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Levin is a member of the House of Representatives powerful Ways and Means committee. House Democratic leader Nancy Pelosi praised Levin in a statement. Levin has been a fearless and dedicated voice for justice and progress.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President Donald Trump said on Saturday the actions of his former national security adviser Michael Flynn were lawful. Flynn on Friday pleaded guilty to lying to the FBI and agreed to cooperate with special counsel Robert Muellers investigation.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

President Donald Trump named Mick Mulvaney, the White House budget director, as acting director of the CFPB on Nov. 24. A federal judge this week refused to block Trumps appointment. Deputy director Leandra English is continuing to pursue the issue.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Top Democrat says lawmakers will want to again interview U.S. President Donald Trumps son-in-law. Jared Kushner in the wake of former adviser Michael Flynns guilty plea. Senator Mark Warner said he remained confident in the panels Republican chairman.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

K.T. McFarland went on to serve in the Trump White House and has been nominated to be the U.S. ambassador to Singapore. She met with investigators for special counsel Robert Mueller, who is looking at contacts between Russians and the Trump administration.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. Republican Senator Bob Corker says he cannot support a sweeping tax bill. Senate Republican leaders have said the bill has enough votes to pass.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Collins had been considered a possible no vote on the sweeping tax overhaul. She said she would support the legislation after securing significant changes. Once the Senate passes the law, it must work with the House of Representatives.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Jared Kushner, President Donald Trumps son-in-law, directed Michael Flynn, then a Trump adviser, to contact Russian officials. Flynn later briefly served as Trumps national security adviser. Flynn pleaded guilty earlier on Friday to lying to the FBI about contacts with Russias ambassador.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Republican U.S. Senator Steve Daines of Montana said on Friday he would support the tax bill. He is one of several senators seen as pivotal to the fate of a Republican tax overhaul plan.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The No. 2 U.S. Senate Republican John Cornyn said on Friday he was confident Republicans have the 50 votes necessary to pass a tax overhaul bill.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Republican Senator Jeff Flake, who had been holding out support for the legislation, said he now supported the bill. Republican Senator Susan Collins, another holdout, said a deal had been reached to include her unspecified property tax deduction amendment in the Republican tax bill.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The United States remains committed to the Libyan Political Agreement, the State Department says. Attempts to bypass the UN-facilitated political process or impose a military solution to the conflict would only destabilize Libya, it says.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Former U.S. national security adviser Michael Flynn pleads guilty to lying to the FBI. Prosecutors: Flynn had spoken with a top member of Trumps transition team regarding his communications with Russias ambassador to the United States.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Former U.S. national security adviser Michael Flynn pleads guilty to a charge of lying to the FBI. Nothing about the guilty plea or the charge implicates anyone other than Flynn, White House says.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Former U.S. national security adviser Michael Flynn pleads guilty to lying to the FBI. Flynn says he made the decision in the best interests of his family and of the country.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Flynn prepared to testify that Trump directed him to make contact with Russians, ABC News reports. The report, which cited a Flynn confidant, is not verified.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

A Republican tax bill in the U.S. Senate stalled on a procedural problem late on Thursday. Senator Bob Corker had wanted to add a provision to the bill that would trigger automatic tax increases in years ahead. But the Senate parliamentarian barred Corkers trigger proposal.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The Republican tax bill would generate a net $407 billion in new revenue from economic growth, the Joint Committee on Taxation says. The legislation would add to the federal deficit.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The Senate Banking Committee will vote on Tuesday on the nomination of Jerome Powell. If confirmed, Powell would assume the Fed chair post after Janet Yellens term expires on Feb. 3.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. Defense Secretary Jim Mattis dismissed reports that President Donald Trump was considering a plan to oust Secretary of State Rex Tillerson. Mattis: "I make nothing of it. Theres nothing to it"
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. President Donald Trump has accepted an invitation by Congress to deliver a State of the Union address on Jan. 30. The speech is typically given every year of a presidents term except the first.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Tillerson will remain as U.S. secretary of state, the White House says. When the president loses confidence in someone, they will no longer serve here, spokeswoman says.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The U.S. Treasury would exhaust all of its borrowing options and run dry of cash to pay its bills by late March or early April if Congress does not raise the debt ceiling before then. If the debt limit remains unchanged, the ability to borrow using extraordinary measures will be exhausted.
